articles.title: Tribute Paid to Martyrs on Harvest Moon Day
articles.content:
Tribute Paid to Martyrs on Harvest Moon Day
						
 Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were placed before the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong, the Patriotic Martyrs' Cemetery in Sinmi-ri and the Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery on Sunday, the Harvest Moon Day.
					 Wreaths sent by Marshal Kim Jong Un were seen standing at the wreath-laying stands of the cemeteries.
					
					 Present at the wreath-laying ceremonies were Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju and other leading officials of the party, state and the army, officials of the party, the armed forces and power organs, social organizations, ministries and national institutions, officers and men of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces and people in the city.
					
					 Wreaths in the names of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK and the Cabinet of the DPRK were laid at the wreath-laying stand of the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong, a wreath in the joint name of the WPK Central Committee and the SPA Presidium and Cabinet of the DPRK at the wreath-laying stand of the Patriotic Martyrs' Cemetery in Sinmi-ri and a wreath in the joint name of the WPK Central Committee, the Central Military Commission of the WPK and the National Defence Commission of the DPRK at the wreath-laying stand "Soul of Heroes" of the Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery.
					
					 Then wreaths in the names of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, social organizations, ministries, national institutions, units of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, scientific, educational, public health and media organizations, party and power organs, enterprises, factories and farms in Pyongyang were placed.
					
					 The participants observed a moment's silence in memory of the martyrs who remained intensely loyal to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and dedicated their youth and lives to the liberation and prosperity of the country and the accomplishment of the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 They looked round the cemeteries.
					
					 Wreaths were also laid before martyrs' statues, cemeteries, monuments to People's Army martyrs and cemeteries of fallen fighters of the KPA across the country on the same day.

articles.title: DPRK Table Tennis Players Bag Medals at International Games
articles.content:
DPRK Table Tennis Players Bag Medals at International Games
						
 Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- The first Far East sports festival of Asian countries took place in Khabarovsk from Sept. 17 to 20.
					 The festival brought together more than 150 excellent men and women players of various universities from the DPRK and other countries.
					
					 The Korean table tennis players bagged four gold medals, five silver medals and one bronze medal, thus coming first in the country standings.
					
					 Kim Hyok Ju won a gold medal in men's single, Kim Hyok Ju and Jo Chang Hyok a gold medal in men's doubles and Jo Chang Hyok and Choe Mun Hyang a gold medal in mixed doubles.
					
					 Finishing runner-up in women's single and in men's single were Choe Mun Hyang and Jo Chang Hyok. O Sam Mi and Choe Mun Hyang came second in women's doubles and Kim Hyok Ju and O Sam Mi also second in mixed doubles while O Sam Mi placed third in women's single.
					
					 The Korean players came first in men's group standings and second in women's group standings.
					
					 They returned home Saturday.

articles.title: Human Rights Are Impossible under Dictatorship: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Human Rights Are Impossible under Dictatorship: Rodong Sinmun
						
 Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- South Korea ill-famed for the worst human rights abuses in the world is staging anti-DPRK "human rights" burlesque, sparking off public criticism at home and abroad, says an article of Rodong Sinmun Sunday.
					 The south Korean politicians are talking about "universal value of human rights" to cover up lots of their human rights abuses and justify confrontation with the fellow countrymen. But they are the criminals who are turning the south Korean society into the world's worst human rights tundra through dictatorial rule, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 These human rights abusers are not entitled to say anything about human rights. 
					
					 The  south Korean "National Assembly" should not trumpet about "human rights" issue of someone but be concerned about fascist misrule by which the dignity and rights of the people are violated and all kinds of ensuing social evils.
					
					 South Koreans are denied such elementary rights as the right to learn, the right to work and the right to get medical treatment. The number of people who give up a life, unable to endure sufferings is on the increase in south Korea where man is made the slave of money.
					
					 The situation clearly proves that people can neither enjoy rights nor live in peace as long as dictatorial forces lord it over in south Korea.

articles.title: Acts Contrary to Atmosphere of Improving North-South Relations Would Cause Only Catastrophe: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Acts Contrary to Atmosphere of Improving North-South Relations Would Cause Only Catastrophe: Rodong Sinmun
						
 Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- Provocative rackets against the fellow countrymen are being reported from south Korea on a daily basis at a time when the north and the south are stepping up the preparations for the reunion of separated families and relatives on the basis of bilateral agreement on it. This can not but be a serious development arousing skepticism about the south Korean authorities' willingness for the improvement of the north-south relations, says Rodong Sinmun Sunday in a commentary.
					 Now is the time for the north and the south to set store by the hard-won opportunity for national reconciliation, refrain from provocative words and acts that may rattle the nerves of the dialogue partner and stir up the atmosphere of dialogue and cooperation to realize the desire of the nation for peace and reunification, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 But the south Korean authorities are talking volumes about dialogue and improvement of the north-south relations but are making no scruple of making provocative remarks and perpetrating hostile acts, revealing their sinister confrontational intention.
					
					 This leaves us skeptical as to whether south Korea was sincere when it reached a crucial agreement on detente and improvement of the north-south relations with the DPRK at the recent north-south high-level urgent contact, and compels us to think over to what point it seeks to lead the relations.
					
					 The north and the south reached a good agreement to settle the touch-and-go situation and achieve dialogue and cooperation but this does not mean it leads to the improvement of the relations of itself.
					
					 To look back on the inglorious history of the north-south relations, any provocative act against the dialogue partner can derail the process for the implementation of the agreement in a moment.
					
					 Acts going against the improvement of the north-south relations are bound to bring a catastrophe.

articles.title: S. Korean Body Urges Authorities to Opt for Mending North-South Ties
articles.content:
S. Korean Body Urges Authorities to Opt for Mending North-South Ties 
						
 Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty in south Korea at a press conference in Seoul on September 24 demanded the authorities come out actively for the improvement of the north-south relations.
					 The organization said the tension that spiraled close to conflict was deescalated by the south-north high-level urgent contact and the publication of a joint press release.
					
					 This raised hope for improving the south-north relations, the organization said, urging the need for the "government" to lift the bar checking the civilian exchanges.
					
					 Urging the authorities to opt for improving the south-north relations from a sincere stand, the body demanded them clarify their will on the occasion of the 8th anniversary of the October 4 declaration.

articles.title: Struggle against Regime Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Struggle against Regime Called for in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- The south Korean newspaper Nodong and Segye said the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions, the April 16 Solidarity, headquarters of the people's movement for checking healthcare de-nationalization, the headquarters for all-people struggle held a press conference outside the Seoul Railway Station on September 25 where they appealed to fight against the authorities' misrule.
					 The speakers accused the present regime of violating the people's rights to existence while giving impression that it can settle the youth employment issue.
					
					 The media is misleading the public opinion over this, an act of committing crimes before history and siding with the criminals, they said.
					
					 Denouncing the authorities for pressing for healthcare de-nationalization recently, they called for overthrowing the regime which seeks to cover up the truth behind the sinking of ferry "Sewol" and to realize retrogressive revision of labor law and privatization.
					
					 They urged the need for all people to fight against the chief executive and the "Saenuri Party" and punish the regime through all-people action on Nov. 14.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Praised by Personage of Myanmar
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Praised by Personage of Myanmar 
 Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un is developing the Workers' Party of Korea into a Juche-type party leading the times, revolution, the country and the nation along the road of victory, and into an ever-victorious party steering the people's cause of independence to its final victory while meeting all challenges.
					 Tin Tun, director of the Myanmar Medical Research Institute, said this in a statement released on September 21 to mark the 18th anniversary of the election of leader Kim Jong Il as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 70th founding anniversary of the party. 
					
					 The statement extended warm congratulations and salute to the WPK and the Korean people on the above-said occasions. 
					
					 The WPK founded by President Kim Il Sung has performed its honorable mission as the party of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, the vanguard of the Korean revolution, as it is holding Kim Jong Il in high esteem as its eternal general secretary, the statement said.
					
					 The director expressed the belief that the WPK and the Korean people would achieve the final victory in the struggle for building a thriving nation and achieving the reunification of Korea under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: WPK's Birthday Marked in Russia, Romania
articles.content:
WPK's Birthday Marked in Russia, Romania 
 Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- There took place seminars in Russia and Romania on September 21 on the occasion of the 70th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					 Dmitri Kostenko, chairman of the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea, said:
					
					 The WPK is the Juche-oriented revolutionary party which inherited the tradition of the Down-with-Imperialism Union formed by the great Comrade Kim Il Sung and a vanguard organization vigorously arousing the popular masses to accomplishing the cause of socialism. 
					
					 Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, guiding idea of the WPK, is the unique ideology and theory. 
					
					 The respected Comrade Kim Jong Un is wisely leading the drive of the WPK and the people of the DPRK for building an economic power and improving the people's living standard. 
					
					 Vasile Orleanu, chairman of the Romanian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, said Kim Il Sung, founder of the WPK and eternal President of the DPRK, was the great leader who set a brilliant example in the building of the Juche-oriented revolutionary party. 
					
					 Eternal General Secretary of the WPK Kim Jong Il developed in depth the Juche idea fathered by the President and authored a lot of works giving comprehensive answers to all the problems arising in the party building and activities, thus performing undying exploits in the history of the WPK, he said, adding:
					
					 The WPK could develop into an invincible revolutionary party entirely thanks to the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Suk's Feats Praised by Nigerian and Guinean Media
articles.content:
Kim Jong Suk's Feats Praised by Nigerian and Guinean Media
						
 Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- Nigerian and Guinean media praised the shining life of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk on the occasion of the 66th anniversary of her demise.
					 The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism－Kimjongilism posted an article on its website saying that Kim Jong Suk fully demonstrated her outstanding military wisdom and stratagem, matchless pluck and courage and marksmanship worthy of a crack shot during the days of the arduous anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					
					 The article went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Suk protected President Kim Il Sung from danger as a human bullet shield in many battles fought against Japanese imperialists. 
					
					 After the liberation of the country she remained intensely loyal to the President.
					
					 Even under the complicated situation right after the country's liberation she as his bodyguard firmly protected his personal safety.
					
					 So she is always remembered by the Korean people as an incarnation guarding the leader at the risk of her life.
					
					 The Guinean Domestic and International Broadcasting Services praised her feats under the title "Shining Life".

articles.title: WPK's Birthday to Be Marked in Russia
articles.content:
WPK's Birthday to Be Marked in Russia 
 Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea was formed in Russia on September 22. 
					 The preparatory committee includes personages of the Russian Institute of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, the Russian Women's Union Named after Kim Jong Suk, the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea and other units and bodies for the study of the Juche idea. 
					
					 The preparatory committee decided to widely introduce the glorious history of the WPK through mass media and hold diverse political and cultural events on the occasion of its birthday which falls on October 10.

articles.title: WPK's Birthday to Be Celebrated in Belarus
articles.content:
WPK's Birthday to Be Celebrated in Belarus
 Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea was inaugurated in Belarus on September 23. 
					 L. Shukolinikov, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Workers' Party of Belarus and chairman of the Standing Presidium of the Belarus National Association of Friends of Korean People Named after Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee. 
					
					 The preparatory committee decided to hold colorful political and cultural events on the occasion of the WPK's birthday.

articles.title: Gifts to Kim Jong Un from Russian Figures
articles.content:
Gifts to Kim Jong Un from Russian Figures 
 Pyongyang, September 27 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un was presented with gifts by Russians on the occasion of the 70th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 They included the general managers of Mental Plus Company Ltd., Gradstroy Company Ltd. and Spetsservispostavka Company Ltd.
					
					 The gifts were handed over to the DPRK ambassador to Russia and an official concerned by General Manager of Mental Plus Company Ltd. S. N. Kaunov, General Manager of Gradstroy Company Ltd. M. I. Kagyakayev, and General Manager of Spetsservispostavka Company Ltd. А. I. Belotynskii on Sept. 11 and 22.
